meanings.definition: A family in which at least one parent has children from a previous relationship.
meanings.sent1: My friend's stepfamily includes his stepsister and stepbrother.
meanings.sent2: The stepfamily went on a picnic to the park on Sunday.
meanings.sent3: The stepfamily's cat thinks it has two homes now.
meanings.sent4: The stepfamily tree grew with new branches after the remarriage.
meanings.sent5: The stepfamily's bond grew stronger over time.

meanings.definition: A family that is formed through remarriage and includes children from the previous marriage(s) of one or both spouses.
meanings.sent1: The stepfamily celebrated their first Christmas together.
meanings.sent2: The stepfamily moved into a new house after the wedding.
meanings.sent3: The stepfamily's dog now has two owners to play with.
meanings.sent4: The stepfamily's love blossomed like a garden in spring.
meanings.sent5: The stepfamily's unity was evident during family game night.
